name: Defenders of the Innocent - A Tower Defense Story
name_original: Defenders of the Innocent - A Tower Defense Story
description:
This is in development.  Testers welcome.  Expect bugs.

Turn based tower defense.

Directions (insufficient directions)

  1. Press the Green Arrow (lower left) to buy towers to use.
  2. Mouse over each item to get description.
  3. Place towers anywhere.
  4. Press the Hour Glass (lower right) to start each round.  6 rounds per turn.
  5. Press Space Bar during the end of turn to pause and unpause.
  6. Enemies will come down the path following the same route as the knight.
  7. Any Peasant or Knight dying is game over.
  8. No win condition implemented yet.  Consider getting to level 6 a win.

PowerUps are only partially implemented.  Will add to list as they become available.

  1. Barracks PowerUps.
  2. WatchTower PowerUps.
